LanguageData.AridShrubland.label: arid shrubland
LanguageData.AridShrubland.description: A dry region, but not dry enough to become a true desert. Open plains with grasses and bushes give way to scattered groves of trees. Plants are hardy and there is a moderate density of animals, but arable soil is hard to find.
LanguageData.Desert.label: desert
LanguageData.Desert.description: A very dry area which supports little life. There is very little arable land, and animal life is very sparse. Deserts can be hot, or quite cold.
LanguageData.ExtremeDesert.label: extreme desert
LanguageData.ExtremeDesert.description: An extremely hot, dry area, devoid of almost all life. Searing heat and a near total lack of arable land make it very difficult to survive here.
